Pre-Game Insights: The Miami Marlins and Toronto Blue Jays meet Saturday in MLB action from Rogers Centre.
The Marlins lost 8-3 Wednesday but won the other two games prior to the series.
Starter Xzavion Curry will pitch for the Marlins, with a 4-7 record and 4.44 ERA this season.
Blue Jays' starter Yariel Rodriguez has a 1-7 record and 4.41 ERA in 20 starts.
The Marlins won their previous game against the Blue Jays 15-5.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Player prop facts for both teams were mentioned, including Vladimir Guerrero Jr., Ernie Clement, Alejandro Kirk, Otto Lopez, Jonah Bride, and Jake Burger.
Betting odds and where to watch the game were included.
